name: STEMfinity Free Elementary Science Activities
description: Collection of free hands-on science activities for elementary grades. Includes experiments in physics, chemistry, biology, and earth science with minimal materials.

name: STEMfinity Free Middle School STEM Challenges
description: Engineering design challenges and STEM projects for middle school students. Downloadable activities covering robotics, coding, engineering, and mathematics.

name: STEMfinity Free High School STEM Labs
description: Advanced STEM laboratory activities for high school. Physics, chemistry, biology, and engineering labs with detailed procedures and analysis questions.

name: STEMfinity LEGO Education Resources
description: Comprehensive LEGO robotics curriculum guides, lesson plans, and competition resources. Support for LEGO WeDo and EV3 platforms for all grade levels.

name: STEMfinity VEX Robotics Curriculum
description: VEX robotics lesson plans and project guides for middle and high school. Competition prep materials and engineering notebooks templates.

name: STEMfinity Arduino Education Materials
description: Arduino project guides and coding tutorials for students. Learn electronics, sensors, and microcontroller programming through hands-on projects.

name: STEMfinity FIRST Robotics Competition Prep
description: Resources for teams preparing for FIRST robotics competitions. Strategy guides, engineering tips, and project management tools for FLL, FTC, and FRC.

name: STEMfinity Science Fair Project Resources
description: Complete science fair project guides from topic selection through presentation. Includes research methods, experimental design, and display tips for all grade levels.

name: STEMfinity Math Competition Prep
description: Practice problems and study guides for math competitions including MATHCOUNTS, AMC 8/10/12. Problem-solving strategies and competition tips.

name: STEMfinity Python Programming for Beginners
description: Introductory Python programming lessons and projects for middle and high school students. Learn variables, loops, functions, and data structures.

name: STEMfinity Scratch Coding Activities
description: Block-based coding projects using Scratch for elementary and middle school. Create games, animations, and interactive stories while learning programming concepts.

name: STEMfinity Web Development Basics
description: Learn HTML, CSS, and JavaScript to build websites. Step-by-step tutorials for creating responsive web pages and interactive features.

name: STEMfinity Engineering Design Process Guide
description: Complete guide to the engineering design process for K-12. Templates, worksheets, and examples for defining problems, brainstorming, prototyping, and testing.

name: STEMfinity Bridge Building Challenge
description: Structural engineering challenge where students design and build bridges using everyday materials. Includes load testing and optimization activities.

name: STEMfinity Rocketry Projects
description: Design, build, and launch model rockets. Learn about aerodynamics, propulsion, and flight stability through hands-on aerospace engineering.

name: STEMfinity Physics Labs and Experiments
description: Collection of physics experiments covering motion, forces, energy, electricity, and magnetism. Suitable for middle and high school with minimal equipment.

name: STEMfinity Chemistry Experiments
description: Safe chemistry experiments and demonstrations for all grade levels. Learn about reactions, states of matter, acids and bases using household items.

name: STEMfinity Biology and Life Science Activities
description: Hands-on biology activities including dissections, cell models, genetics simulations, and ecosystem studies. Age-appropriate for all grade levels.

name: STEMfinity Earth Science and Geology
description: Earth science activities covering rocks and minerals, weather, climate, plate tectonics, and space. Includes virtual simulations and hands-on experiments.

name: STEMfinity Elementary Math Games and Activities
description: Fun math activities for elementary students covering number sense, operations, geometry, and measurement. Hands-on games and manipulatives.

name: STEMfinity Algebra Problem Sets
description: Algebra practice problems with detailed solutions. Topics include equations, inequalities, functions, and graphing for middle and high school.

name: STEMfinity Geometry Projects
description: Hands-on geometry projects and explorations. Learn about shapes, angles, transformations, and proofs through construction and visualization.

name: STEMfinity Statistics and Data Analysis
description: Learn statistics through real-world data analysis projects. Topics include data collection, graphs, measures of center, and probability.

name: STEMfinity 3D Printing Projects
description: Introduction to 3D design and printing. Learn Tinkercad and other CAD software to create models for 3D printing. Project files and tutorials included.

name: STEMfinity Maker Projects and Crafts
description: Creative maker projects combining art, engineering, and technology. Build electronic greeting cards, LED projects, and simple circuits.

name: STEMfinity Drone Technology Basics
description: Introduction to drones, flight principles, and programming. Learn about aeronautics, sensors, and autonomous flight for middle and high school.

name: STEMfinity Teacher Curriculum Guides
description: Comprehensive curriculum guides for K-12 STEM teachers. Lesson plans, standards alignment, assessment tools, and classroom management strategies.

name: STEMfinity STEM Classroom Setup Guide
description: Resources for setting up STEM classrooms, makerspaces, and robotics labs. Equipment recommendations, layout ideas, and budget planning.

name: STEMfinity Grant Writing Resources
description: Guide to finding and applying for STEM education grants. Sample proposals, tips for success, and database of funding opportunities for schools.

name: STEMfinity Renewable Energy Projects
description: Hands-on projects exploring solar, wind, and hydroelectric power. Build working models and learn about sustainable energy solutions.

name: STEMfinity Environmental Engineering Challenges
description: Design solutions to environmental problems like water filtration, pollution reduction, and habitat restoration. Real-world engineering challenges.

name: STEMfinity Climate Science Education
description: Learn about climate change, greenhouse effect, and environmental impact through data analysis and modeling activities.
stem_fields: Environmental Science, Climate Science, Data Science

name: STEMfinity STEM Career Exploration
description: Explore diverse STEM careers through videos, interviews, and virtual job shadowing. Learn about education pathways and career opportunities.

name: STEMfinity Women in STEM Profiles
description: Profiles of women scientists, engineers, and technologists. Inspiring stories and career paths to encourage girls in STEM fields.

name: STEMfinity Diversity in STEM Resources
description: Resources highlighting contributions of underrepresented groups in STEM. Biographical content, discussion guides, and inclusive teaching practices.
